name: MBlue Nav-Toolbox BG Setup - Firefox Logo 2 Vista
description:
MBlue Nav-Toolbox BG Setup - Firefox Logo 2 Vista
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Description:
 1. Changes the NAVIGATOR-TOOLBOX, the MENUBAR, the NAV-BAR and the BOOKMARKS-BAR Background & Settings.
 2. Adds a Firefox Logo BG on the Toolbox left side.
 3. Transforms the BOOKMARKS-BAR and make it similar to Vista.
 4. Customizable Background Color.
 5. Customizable Padding for increase/decrease the Toolbars height.
 6. Integrates with all the "Nav-Style" styles.
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Notes:
-If something looks wrong, try to not use other styles/extensions that changes the Navigator-Toolbox settings.

-This style replaces some "Nav-Style Bookmarks-Bar Vista" and "Nav-Style Menubar Vista" settings, if you are using it.
--------------------------------------------------------------------
CUSTOMIZING:

 1. NAVIGATOR-TOOLBOX BACKGROUND COLOR.
 2. MENUBAR & NAV-BAR LEFT MARGIN.
 3. MENUBAR PADDING.
 4. NAV-BAR PADDING.
 5. BOOKMARKS-BAR PADDING.
 6. BOOKMARKS-BAR, MENUBAR & NAV-BAR TEXT SETTINGS.
 7. BOOKMARKS-BAR BACKGROUND COLOR/IMAGE.
 8. CHANGE THE TOOLBOX BACKGROUND IMAGE.

> GO TO BOTTOM OF THE PAGE TO CUSTOMIZE
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Supported Extensions:
 ---
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Integrates with:
 MBlue Combine Nav-Buttons Vista
 MBlue Nav-Style (all styles)
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Updates:
 11.01.2009 Ver. 0.3.0 = added namespace
 15.10.2008 Ver. 0.2.0 = ready to release
 05.10.2008 Ver. 0.1.9 = few fixes
 03.10.2008 Ver. 0.1.8 = added more custom options
 02.10.2008 Ver. 0.1.7 = added info, few fixes
 01.10.2008 Ver. 0.1.6 = added customizing options
 30.09.2008 Ver. 0.1.5 = better integration, code optimized
 29.09.2008 Ver. 0.1.4 = backgrounds redesigned, few fixes
 28.09.2008 Ver. 0.1.3 = removed useless code
 26.09.2008 Ver. 0.1.2 = few fixes, code cleaned
 25.09.2008 Ver. 0.1.1 = backgrounds changed
 24.09.2008 Ver. 0.1.0 = temp version
--------------------------------------------------------------------
This is just a customizable background setup that I made for using with my Nav-Style styles (but can be used with other styles as well). Enjoy! Comments/Suggestions are welcome.
css:
/*------------------------------------------------------------------
 MBlue Nav-Toolbox BG Setup - Firefox Logo 2 Vista (Ver. 0.3.0)
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Author: M.BLUE - Tested on: Firefox 3.0.5 - Last Update: 11.01.2009
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Description:
 1. Changes the NAVIGATOR-TOOLBOX, the MENUBAR, the NAV-BAR and
    the BOOKMARKS-BAR Background & Settings.
 2. Adds a Firefox Logo BG on the Toolbox left side.
 3. Transforms the BOOKMARKS-BAR and make it similar to Vista.
 4. Customizable Background Color.
 5. Customizable Padding for increase/decrease the Toolbars height.
 6. Integrates with all the "Nav-Style" styles.
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Notes:
-If something looks wrong, try to not use other styles/extensions
 that changes the Navigator-Toolbox settings.

-This style replaces some "Nav-Style Bookmarks-Bar Vista" and
 "Nav-Style Menubar Vista" settings, if you are using it.
--------------------------------------------------------------------
CUSTOMIZING:

 1. NAVIGATOR-TOOLBOX BACKGROUND COLOR.
 2. MENUBAR & NAV-BAR LEFT MARGIN.
 3. MENUBAR PADDING.
 4. NAV-BAR PADDING.
 5. BOOKMARKS-BAR PADDING.
 6. BOOKMARKS-BAR, MENUBAR & NAV-BAR TEXT SETTINGS.
 7. BOOKMARKS-BAR BACKGROUND COLOR/IMAGE.
 8. CHANGE THE TOOLBOX BACKGROUND IMAGE.

> GO TO BOTTOM OF THE PAGE TO CUSTOMIZE
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Supported Extensions:
 ---
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Integrates with:
 MBlue Combine Nav-Buttons Vista
 MBlue Nav-Style (all styles)
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Updates:
 11.01.2009 Ver. 0.3.0 = added namespace
 15.10.2008 Ver. 0.2.0 = ready to release
 05.10.2008 Ver. 0.1.9 = few fixes
 03.10.2008 Ver. 0.1.8 = added more custom options
 02.10.2008 Ver. 0.1.7 = added info, few fixes
 01.10.2008 Ver. 0.1.6 = added customizing options
 30.09.2008 Ver. 0.1.5 = better integration, code optimized
 29.09.2008 Ver. 0.1.4 = backgrounds redesigned, few fixes
 28.09.2008 Ver. 0.1.3 = removed useless code
 26.09.2008 Ver. 0.1.2 = few fixes, code cleaned
 25.09.2008 Ver. 0.1.1 = backgrounds changed
 24.09.2008 Ver. 0.1.0 = temp version
------------------------------------------------------------------*/



@namespace url(http://www.mozilla.org/keymaster/gatekeeper/there.is.only.xul);

/* REMOVE BORDERS & MARGINS */

#navigator-toolbox, #toolbar-menubar, #nav-bar, #PersonalToolbar, #browser {
border: none !important;
margin: 0 !important;
}



/* NAVIGATOR-TOOLBOX SETTINGS & BG */

#navigator-toolbox {
-moz-appearance: none !important;
-moz-border-bottom-colors: none !important;
padding: 0 !important;
border: none !important;
background: #eeeeee 
url("data:image/png;base64,") 
no-repeat center left !important;
}



/* MENUBAR BG */

#toolbar-menubar {
-moz-appearance: none !important;
background: transparent 
url("data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAAEAAAAQCAYAAADXnxW3AAAAGXRFWHRTb2Z0d2FyZQBBZG9iZSBJbWFnZVJlYWR5ccllPAAAACpJREFUeNpi+P///0wmBgaGLSDiB5z4iYv7G5X4CyL+MQBNYQCxGAACDAAm3BMaNdxeggAAAABJRU5ErkJggg==") repeat-x top !important;
}



/* NAV-BAR BG */

#nav-bar {
-moz-appearance: none !important;
background: transparent 
url("data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAAEAAAAQCAYAAADXnxW3AAAAGXRFWHRTb2Z0d2FyZQBBZG9iZSBJbWFnZVJlYWR5ccllPAAAACNJREFUeNpi+P//PwMTAxDgJZhBBCsqwQEi2OEsLhBhDBBgAPJBA4LOb+LSAAAAAElFTkSuQmCC") repeat-x bottom !important;
}



/* BOOKMARKS-BAR SETTINGS & BG */

#main-window #navigator-toolbox #PersonalToolbar {
-moz-appearance: none !important;
background: transparent  
url("data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAAEAAAAaCAYAAAB2BDbRAAAAGXRFWHRTb2Z0d2FyZQBBZG9iZSBJbWFnZVJlYWR5ccllPAAAAG5JREFUeNoch8EOwiAQBfFpgEYwJk3aD/Gz+1cmvZieZenCrqxzmMxcVHXDvpc3nHMMEWmmgt47g/lsVhW1EoOIGkr5Cs6BVbsex+cF74MihL+ijPWCGKduqraElDIh50fFui46Kt0wz8/7T4ABAAGRPgAh6Q4dAAAAAElFTkSuQmCC") repeat-x center !important;
margin: 0 !important;
padding: 0 !important;
min-height: 28px !important;
max-height: 28px !important;
border: none !important;
border-top: solid 1px #777777 !important;
border-bottom: solid 1px #888888 !important;
opacity: 1.0 !important;
}










/*=========================[CUSTOMIZE]============================*/



#navigator-toolbox {



/*------------------------------------------------------------------
[1] NAVIGATOR-TOOLBOX BACKGROUND-COLOR

Below you can change the Navigator-Toolbox background color.

Example:
 #cadaf4 = light blue (default)
 #ffdd88 = light orange
 #aaffbb = light green
 #223366 = dark blue
 #884400 = dark orange
 #226633 = dark green
 #ffffff = white
 #eeeeee = light gray
 #cccccc = light-medium gray
 #aaaaaa = medium gray
 #888888 = dark-medium gray
 #555555 = dark gray
 #000000 = black
------------------------------------------------------------------*/
  background-color: #cadaf4 !important;}
/*----------------------------------------------------------------*/



#toolbar-menubar, #nav-bar {



/*------------------------------------------------------------------
[2] MENUBAR & NAV-BAR LEFT MARGIN

Below you can change the left margin.
Default: 128px
------------------------------------------------------------------*/
  padding-left: 128px !important;}
/*----------------------------------------------------------------*/



#toolbar-menubar {



/*------------------------------------------------------------------
[3] MENUBAR PADDING

Increase or decrease the top/bottom padding to make the Menubar
bigger or smaller.
Increase or decrease the right padding to have more or less space
on the right side of the bar.
------------------------------------------------------------------*/
  padding-top: 2px !important;
  padding-bottom: 0px !important;
/*----------------------------------------------------------------*/
  padding-right: 4px !important;}
/*----------------------------------------------------------------*/



#nav-bar {



/*------------------------------------------------------------------
[4] NAV-BAR PADDING

Increase or decrease the top/bottom padding to make the Nav-Bar
bigger or smaller.
Increase or decrease the right padding to have more or less space
on the right side of the bar.
------------------------------------------------------------------*/
  padding-top: 0px !important;
  padding-bottom: 2px !important;
/*----------------------------------------------------------------*/
  padding-right: 3px !important;}
/*----------------------------------------------------------------*/



#main-window #navigator-toolbox #PersonalToolbar {



/*------------------------------------------------------------------
[5] BOOKMARKS-BAR PADDING

Increase or decrease the left/right padding to have more or less
space on the left/right side of the bar.

NOTE: don't change these values if you are using the
      "Nav-Style Bookmarks-Bar Vista" style.
------------------------------------------------------------------*/
  padding-left: 0px !important;
  padding-right: 0px !important;}
/*----------------------------------------------------------------*/



#toolbar-menubar #main-menubar > menu .menubar-text,
#toolbar-menubar .toolbarbutton-text,
#nav-bar .toolbarbutton-text {



/*------------------------------------------------------------------
[6a] MENUBAR & NAV-BAR TEXT SETTINGS

Below you can change the Main-Menu and button's Labels text
color/size/weight/opacity on the Menubar & Nav-Bar.

NOTE: this replaces the "Nav-Style Menubar Vista" settings, if you
      are using it.
------------------------------------------------------------------*/
/* TEXT COLOR:               */ color: #000000 !important;
/* SIZE (8/16):              */ font-size: 10px !important;
/* WEIGHT (normal, bold):    */ font-weight: bold !important;
/* OPACITY                   */ opacity: 1.0 !important;}
/*----------------------------------------------------------------*/



#main-window #navigator-toolbox #PersonalToolbar toolbarbutton > label {



/*------------------------------------------------------------------
[6b] BOOKMARKS-BAR TEXT SETTINGS

Below you can change the text color/size/weight/opacity/align.

NOTE: this replaces the "Nav-Style Bookmarks-Bar Vista" settings,
      if you are using it.
------------------------------------------------------------------*/
/* TEXT COLOR:               */ color: #fafafa !important;
/* SIZE (8/16):              */ font-size: 10px !important;
/* WEIGHT (normal, bold):    */ font-weight: bold !important;
/* OPACITY                   */ opacity: 0.9 !important;
/* Vertical Align (0/4):     */ margin-bottom: 0px !important;}
/*----------------------------------------------------------------*/



#main-window #navigator-toolbox #PersonalToolbar {



/*------------------------------------------------------------------
[7a] BOOKMARKS-BAR BACKGROUND-COLOR

Below you can change the Bookmarks-Bar background color. Optionally
you can also change the border's color.

Example:
 rgba(0,0,0,1.0)       = black (opaque)
 rgba(0,0,24,0.8)      = vista black (transparent) (default)
 rgba(128,128,128,0.6) = gray (transparent)
 rgba(255,255,255,0.6) = white (transparent)
 rgba(255,128,32,1.0)  = light orange (opaque)
 rgba(32,255,128,1.0)  = light green (opaque)
 rgba(32,128,255,1.0)  = light blue (opaque)

NOTE: this replaces the "Nav-Style Bookmarks-Bar Vista" settings,
      if you are using it.

----------------------[RED-GREEN-BLUE-OPACITY]--------------------*/
  background-color: rgba(0,0,24,0.8) !important;
/*----------------------------------------------------------------*/
  border-top-color: #777777 !important;
  border-bottom-color: #888888 !important;}
/*----------------------------------------------------------------*/







/*------------------------------------------------------------------
[7b] REMOVE BOOKMARKS-BAR BACKGROUND-IMAGE (OPTIONAL)

You can optionally make the Bookmarks-Bar flat. Just remove the
lines before and after the code.
------------------------------------------------------------------*/



/* REMOVE THIS TO ACTIVATE <--

#main-window #navigator-toolbox #PersonalToolbar {
background-image: none !important;
border-top: solid 1px transparent !important;}

--> REMOVE THIS TO ACTIVATE */



/*------------------------------------------------------------------
[8] CHANGE THE TOOLBOX BACKGROUND-IMAGE (OPTIONAL)

You can optionally replace the Firefox Logo image with another
image. Just remove the lines before and after the code (this makes
the image disappear if you want a blank background) and then write
the image link.

Should be something like: url("http://www.sitename.com/image1.png")

Use transparent PNG images (around 128x128px) for better results.
------------------------------------------------------------------*/



/* REMOVE THIS TO ACTIVATE <--

#navigator-toolbox {
background-image: 
url("http://www.") !important;
}

--> REMOVE THIS TO ACTIVATE */





/* END */
